name: Tuyet Dang Apartment
address: 24 Lac Chinh, Ba Dinh, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Tuyet Dang Apartment offers accommodation in Hanoi, 500 metres from Tran Quoc Pagoda and 600 metres from Quan Thanh Temple. The apartment is 900 metres from West Lake. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.

There is a seating area and a kitchen complete with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. A flat-screen TV is provided.

Dong Xuan Market is 1.2 km from Tuyet Dang Apartment, while Ho Chi Minh Mausoleum is 1.3 km away. Noi Bai International Airport is 19 km from the property.
